Notes: Confirmed non-existent. Name conflates Chronoclust (bioinformatics cytometry) with archaeology chronology packages like ChronoModel, ArchaeoChron.
Confabulation - reverses R naming conventions. Real package is RChronoModel (R prefix, not r suffix) on CRAN.
Confirmed real. GitHub: mrecos/klrfome, JOSS 2019 DOI: 10.21105/joss.00722. Archaeological predictive site modeling.
Dutch national archaeological information system (Archeologisch Informatiesysteem), managed by Cultural Heritage Agency of Netherlands.
Wrong domain - architectural building modeling for pandemic air quality simulation, not archaeological ABM. PyPI package exists but unrelated to archaeology.
Bioinformatics FASTQ quality control - legitimately used in ancient DNA analysis pipelines for archaeological science.
NetLogo agent-based model for Iron Age to Hellenistic resource exploitation in Sagalassos region. Published in JCAA, replication data at KU Leuven.
Ancient DNA damage pattern analysis. GitHub: kkdey/aRchaic. Paleogenomics/bioarchaeology tool.
Wrong domain - protein amyloid-forming region prediction tool. Not repurposable for archaeology.
Confused with ArchR (bioinformatics ATAC-seq tool). No archaeology R package by this name exists.
Lucidea commercial museum collections management software with explicit archaeology support.
No evidence of existence. Possibly confused with choroplethr mapping package.
Ancient DNA authentication tool. GitHub: ginolhac/mapDamage. Published in Bioinformatics, 1000+ citations, listed in open-archaeo.
No evidence of existence. Possibly confused with pastclim (paleoclimate package).
Does not exist on PyPI. Likely confused with pyArchInit (QGIS plugin for Italian archaeology).
Population genetics recombination rate inference - legitimately used in archaeogenomics studies.
No evidence of existence anywhere - CRAN, PyPI, GitHub, or web search.
Major crowdsourcing platform co-founded by UCL Institute of Archaeology and British Museum (2014). micropasts.org, 3500+ volunteers.
Does not exist. Confused with PECE (Platform for Experimental Collaborative Ethnography) or similar.
Generic acronym with no archaeology-specific tool. No evidence in repositories or literature.
Does not exist. Confused with RChronoModel (the real CRAN package).

JOAD extreme fail fabrication. Real alternatives: ARIADNEplus, Arches, tDAR.
JOAD extreme fail fabrication. Real alternatives: ArchAIDE, RACORD.

JOAD extreme fail fabrication. Real alternatives: FAIMS, ARK, STRATUM.
JOAD extreme fail fabrication. General GIS visualisation tools exist, no archaeology-specific GeoViz.
JOAD extreme fail - claimed archaeological tool. Real ImageQuant is Cytiva molecular biology gel analysis software.

Verified real: Bayesian radiocarbon wiggle-matching tool by J. Andr√©s Christen (2003). Cross-validated discovery (2 services, 3 instances). IA issue 13.
